website_summaries.verdict: A thick and comfortable topper that offers a good combination of plush comfort and support.
pros: Owners praise this topper for its soft feel that offers both support and cozy softness to sink into
It fits existing mattresses well, and some report it holds up well even after months of use
cons: Some owners report that it loses firmness over time, and a few felt it traps heat

customer_reviews.title: Best Pad Yet
customer_reviews.text: The pad was just what we needed. We are both in our 70's and were suffering from aching shoulders and hips every morning. We now wake up much more refreshed than before. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: S. S. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Make WONDERFUL dog beds !
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful value. Not sure you'll really appreciate this but I cut it up into four equal parts and made dog beds out of them. I saved a LOT of money this way ! I made the liners and fleece topped covers. They LOVE it ! Great price !
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT true memory foam - just a knock off
customer_reviews.text: This is foam, but it is not memory foam. It is not supportive at all, it just sinks so that you wake up in a sunken hole that is hard to get out off. VERY uncomfortable compared to true memory foam. I should have realized it was not memory foam since it was so light-weight. Very disappointed- waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Memory Foam Topper
customer_reviews.text: Love our new memory foam mattress topper. Our mattress is only 2yrs old but it was losing its firmness & was making it uncomfortable to sleep. Our 1st night on this topper & we didn't wake up once!😀Fits perfect to our king sz bed& our sheets fit perfect as well. No more tossing & turning all night-just pure comfort & sleep. Great price considering we got the king sz, 4inch deep topper. Thanks Amazon~We love it👌🏼💛😴😴😴
customer_reviews.author: G Valente

customer_reviews.title: A REAL WASTE OF $$$$$
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover is not what i thought i was ordering, It comes with a cover, but the cover does not have any gripping ability, so it moves so much that i spend many hours pushing it back into place. I am also convinced that the mattress is too large for my bed. I ordered a queen size, but I can never align it with the mattress. Therefore, the mattress cover makes the bed uncomfortable, as a part is always hanging off the edge of the mattress. This purchase was a real disappointment and a real waste of $$$.
customer_reviews.author: Benders

customer_reviews.title: The best mattress pad !!
customer_reviews.text: I waited 4 months to write a review so I could tell how well this pad wears. I love, love, love this pad. It is the perfect mixture between firm and soft and it forms perfectly to your body. I bought a cheaper foam pad on amazon and within a couple of months, it started to become flattened and smooshed down where I laid. I felt like I was in a hole. This pad has kept its shape and has made my mattress so much more comfortable. My parent's have a temperapedic mattress that is 6000 dollars and they think my bed with this mattress pad is just as comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Wadden

customer_reviews.title: Not quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT true memory foam. Really disappointed. I researched mattress toppers before buying and this brand was listed as best for people with low back pain. I ordered it and was worried because the first time I layed down I sunk like a boulder. I am 200 pounds and every time I lay on this I sink into a hole all the way thru this 4 inch pad. Slept on it all night and couldn't get out of it in the morning and now my back hurts worse. Really hoping I get my money back. This is just a cheap piece of low quality foam.
customer_reviews.author: MissHFitz

customer_reviews.title: Two pieces glued together! Not cool.
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed at this topper. I read one review about their disappointment with two pieces glued together to make one piece but I just thought it was a blip! But it’s not. I’ve purchased many toppers and never have I received one with two colors/types of padding fused together with glue! It also looked used. Box was re-taped around bottom and no zipper pull on cover. Very disappointed. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Yllwrobin

customer_reviews.title: It won't stay in place on the mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have to give this a 1 star because it keeps sliding off the mattress. Every morning it over hangs the mattress 2-3 inches. It's difficult for me to handle because I have a really bad back. If I sleep toward the front of the mattress I feel like I'm going to fall out of bed. I have to sleep clear against the wall. Clearly I have no way to repackage this and return it but of the 3 other mattress toppers I have on other beds this is the first one I've seen slide off the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE, GREAT PRODUCT! Highly recommend this for arthritis pain!
customer_reviews.text: This is AWESOME! I was having pretty bad hip pain in the mornings and know that I needed to replace my mattress which I couldn't do immediately. Bought this to see if I could relieve some of the pain. It works very well, fits my double bed perfectly but needed extra deep fitted sheets & mattress cover. All together, it's like a brand new bed and has definitely helped arthritis hip pain. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this product! GREAT VALUE & arrived in 2 days with Prime. THANK YOU!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Dammmmn this mattress topper is amazing! 4" is larger then I expected
customer_reviews.text: Dammmmn this mattress topper is amazing! 4" is larger then I expected, I feel like the princess and the pea. Soft, but not to soft. Can't wait for the second night with this lovely mattress topper! Buy now!
customer_reviews.author: Danya P.

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT NOW!
customer_reviews.text: I've camped in RVs for the past 13 years. Wish I bought this a LONG time ago. Amazing. Better sleep than my $2k mattress at home. Put it on top of my Rockwood RV short queen - not one morning was I stiff, had pain, or numbness in my arms. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: gloria whalen

customer_reviews.title: Best Mattress Topper
customer_reviews.text: I stayed over my sister's house and slept so well in her guest bedroom that had this topper on it and I had to buy it. Now I have had it since October and sleep like a baby still on it. My friends have now gotten it and I will be getting it for my parents guest room as well. Best topper out there and best price.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Sicari

customer_reviews.title: Too soft, sink in, hard to move.  Flipping to the foam side works great!
customer_reviews.text: Initially we thought we'd love this. However, it is WAY too soft so we sink into it. This makes it hard to move and roll over at night (and we almost stick to it...even with sheets). HOWEVER, we flipped it to the foam side as a last stich effort and it's much more firm and supportive. Now we love it. Unfortunately the zipper runs along the top side now so it's not ideal but it's much better. We can make this work for a year or so before buying a new mattress. The mattress pad doesn't breath much, but it's hard to avoid with memory foam type mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Marsala

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pad!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful pad!!!! I was waking up in the morning with backaches and hip pain from my mattress. With this pad I no longer have the back pain and hip pain. I am so excited!!!! I thought because of my heavyset frame the pad would not work but it works wonderfully. When I lay down I feel like I'm being cuddled by comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement it's 3 inches not 4 inches
customer_reviews.text: I've slept on the mattress topper for three nights. It's soft and firm at the same time. I did appreciate it came in a zippered encasement; however, I do not appreciate the false advertisement of four inches thick when it's clearly three inches thick (check out the picture). It's too cumbersome to place it back in the two bags that the topper came in, besides they are discarded. It serves a purpose, but I will not purchase this topper again. I deserve 25% of the cost back since I received 75% of a mattress topper.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Valerie N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: WOW! I absolutely love this thing! I have a futon so i can watch movies in my bedroom theater and the mattress is a little too firm. I previously had a 3" memory foam topper which was good, but memory foam has hardly any support. While it feels like youre sleeping on a cloud with memory foam, im a side sleeper and i sunk right through it. This is NOT memory foam (except the negligible inch on the top layer). This is high density foam that definitely doesnt feel like sleeping on a cloud, BUT it offers way more support. I now wake up feeling refreshed as a side sleeper. I highly recommend this mattress topper!
customer_reviews.author: W.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed - Doesn't feel like memory foam
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel anything like memory foam. It feels like soft polyethylene foam on top of firmer polyethylene foam. We can't detect any memory effect at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Wife loved it so much she wouldn’t let me buy us a new bed.
customer_reviews.text: Like any foam insert it does keep you pretty warm, it traps hairs in it to which is weird that it was getting them through the sheets but no big problem. It was ridiculously soft and was perfect for my lower back pain. I have a limp from knee surgery so my spine is all messed up sleeping on this with our old matters I didn’t wake with pain anymore. It took me awhile to convince her to let me get us a new bed, cause of how well it worked. She eventually let me, but she held out for awhile cause of how great this is.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Bates

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be unhappier
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this mattress for over a year. It starts out good.. it was comfy considering what I was sleeping on prior.... but now I’m aching, tossing and turning. The pressure on my joints is unreal. I wake up so unhappy and in pain. Not a true memory foam. It’s too squishy and no give. I hate it. Already purchased a new full mattress coming soon. I can’t wait to see how this feels. 🤞🏼
customer_reviews.author: Deb Elias

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress topper for those who love europlush pillow top mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about buying this online but my daughter bought the same one & swore by it. It was either this or a brand new mattress which would’ve cost me probably $300 more. I’m glad I took the chance on this. It’s super comfortable. It’s the kind of mattress that when you wake up in the morning you don’t want to get up because it’s so comfy. My camper bed now compares to my europlush pillow top home mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Scp427

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much the perfect topper..
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this topper. It expanded to the correct size and is soft but not fall down deep into a cloud soft. I woke up prepared to be sore, like usual, and after the first night using this topper I was able to get out of bed without any pain! The mattress that I sleep on is old and this was a game changer. I highly recommend this heavenly sleep miracle because of the quality, comfort and durability. The cover is easy to remove and is soft, there is no smell at all, and there is no trouble with it expanding to it's full height.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Polgara

customer_reviews.title: Do. Not. Buy. — breaks down quickly
customer_reviews.text: Do. Not. Buy. I bought this exact topper several years ago, it was wonderful. Lasted us 3 years. Figured I would get it again so pulled up the same link and bought another one. The newer ones are made with something much less durable. It was comfortable for about a month then my wife and I both started having neck pain/back pain. We turned it and it was comfortable for about another month. Ended up taking it off and buying a different brand from Costco. Heed the warning: Do. Not. Buy.
customer_reviews.author: David Cagle

customer_reviews.title: I LOOOOOOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I first learned about this topper when I visited a friend and asked what kind of mattress I slept on because I did not want to leave the bed during my entire trip. I was surprised to find out it was a topper. They told me which one, I looked it up and purchased immediately. It's like I have a brand new mattress without spending a bunch of money. To get my son out of my bed, I purchased one for him as well and he loves it. I've been telling everyone about it. I know 2 others that have purchased and they absolutely love it as well.
customer_reviews.author: L Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I flipped my mattress due to sinking in the middle, however when I flipped it, it was too firm - had a terrible time sleeping on it but with social distancing, I couldn’t go out to buy a new mattress set. I decided to buy this topper without any high expectations. It arrived the next day. Surprised that it quickly took it's shape after opening it. No odor and I was able to sleep on it the same day it was delivered. I’m sleeping so well - its so comfortable, soft, yet it doesn’t sink in - no aches!
customer_reviews.author: Yourfriendintx

customer_reviews.title: No Way Near 4inches
customer_reviews.text: No way close to being 4inches. More like 2inches at best and that’s after weeks after being out of the box. Super firm almost to a point where I’d say it’s uncomfortable. Too much of a bother to return. I’ll use it until I’m able to save for the one at JCPenney. At least I can see and test before I buy. This one will be cut up for use in the dog kennel.
customer_reviews.author: monimo

customer_reviews.title: Not 4inches. If you care about inches, go with another seller.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this mattress topper for our Queen Bed. Pros: Low-No odor Expanded quickly Clean-no stains, mold, smells Packaged nicely to protect topper The zippered casing Cons: The MAIN CON is that our mattress topper DID NOT EXPAND TO 4 inches, as you can see from photos. For me, it’s a big deal that it didn’t expand to 4inches since that is what I paid for. I looked at several other toppers, and if I wanted a 3inch topper then I would’ve bought that instead, and saved the money. For $129.00 I don’t think it is worth the price. Get a different topper instead.
customer_reviews.author: KFoster

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping on air
customer_reviews.text: I love these mattress pads! A definite 4 inches and you just sink into it at night. Also, it does NOT leave the imprint of your body like my last mattress pad. These are great!
customer_reviews.author: princess

customer_reviews.title: My Back Pain Is Gone!
customer_reviews.text: First off, I'm male, 5'10" and about 240#. I've had lower back pain for years and have gone through 5 or 6 mattresses in the last few years to relieve it. To no avail. I bought this mattress topper based on the reviews it received about relieving lower back pain for side sleepers. I put this topper on my 8" thick firm mattress and to my amazement, it worked! It gives me just the right amount of support needed to alleviate my lower back pain, and now I sleep soundly through the night. Great product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: I’m sure it’s nice, but not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: I’m not gonna give this a one stair review, but I will say that it smelt awful. Like really bad. And I know I was supposed to air it out, but I like in a 800sq ft apart. There really wasn’t a good place to put this thing when it had an awful smell. Like bad. Also, it didn’t inflate to 4inch. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Z

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Yea, you will like this. I put it on my foolishly useless futon mattress to help with it being able to be slept on and it worked wonders. I keep my futon open as a bed so its fine. If you want to use on your futon and use as a couch when you want, you will find that it won't work. The original futon mattress and this topper will be too much and it will stick out far past the front of the futon. But, for pure comfort, this rivals my 3K bed and in fact, I think is more comfortable than my bed. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Skyent

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 inches!
customer_reviews.text: Typically don't write reviews but for $150 for a topper I felt this may help someone. Product is not 4 inches as described, even after waiting 48 hours for expansion as they recommended doing. The corners and edges did not fully expand either. Zippers also do not have a pull on them. We had to attach a paper clip just to use it. Amazon customer service excellent but buy elsewhere if you are looking to get 4 inches or high quality foam.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Engel

customer_reviews.title: This was a very nice product. However after over a month of use
customer_reviews.text: I need help. This was a very nice product. However after over a month of use, my back is just killing me. It's a bit too soft and I just squish down inside the mattress when I lay down. There ends up being not much support on the small of my back and its just stressed all night and when I wake up it feels like I've been working out all night. I would like to return this and maybe get a 2-inch one with high density foam. PLEASE HELP! Seann
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Coleman Camper UPGRADE
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my 2011 Coleman PUP's front mattress fiberfill cheap junk with this...I needed a electric carving knife (like for your T'Giving turkey) to trim it to size. I then replaced the included cover, folded it under, and stuffed it into my camper's original mattress cover, and plopped it back into my camper. The camper's parts book states 3 1/2 inch thickness for the original, and this is 4 - top still closed & latched easily. And WHAT an improvement in sleep comfort. HIGHLY recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dave B

customer_reviews.title: Great for hip arthritis and side sleepers!
customer_reviews.text: This basically deleted my arthritis hip pain! It feels like sleeping on a cloud. I thought it had a cooling strip on it, but I don’t think so, but I use calling sheets to help with the heat during sleep. I can totally recommend it for hip arthritis and especially side sleepers. Some back sleepers may love it, too. If you have neck and shoulder strains and pains you may not like it as much unless you use a neck pillow because you sink in some some it leaves your neck crooked a little if on a too high pillow. Just an observation I noticed since I have both. Overall, great purchase though, I go to sleep smiling:)
customer_reviews.author: JHud

customer_reviews.title: Not memory foam. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars... After unboxing it was very clear that this was not memory foam. It is basically just generic poly foam. Like an old couch cushion. The weight alone is a clear give away. Weighs about 10#. Seriously. Looking back at reviews it's clear they changed their manufacturer. All these great reviews are from last year. And what a pain packing this thing up to get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except for the heat.
customer_reviews.text: This topper is great in every aspect. I took a star off because it retains a lot of heat. I really like the cold when I sleep and I run the AC a lot or even open the windows in the winter but I've woken up a little sweaty every morning since I've bought this. I'm going to see if I can find a way to keep it from retaining all that heat. Please let me know if you have found a solution. This would be a 5 star mattress if not for the heat issue.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief. Easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed. I have shoulder tendonitis on both shoulders. The pain and numbness down my arms and fingers kept waking me up every night. I'd also wake up with back pain. This has helped with it all. I have it set up on the floor without a mattress and use interlocking foam mats. It is the exact amount of firmness and softness I need. It was easy for me to set up despite my shoulder problems. I didn't notice any strong scents even though I am sensitive to smells. I'm happy I bought this and I recommended it.
customer_reviews.author: eva

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We added this to our standard RV mattress along with a 3" mattress pad topper. It makes sleeping in the RV so much more comfortable and I can actually breathe when I get up in the morning. It is true to size, expanded as it said it would and honestly I didn't notice a smell. We placed it on top of the standard mattress allowed several days to expand and then made the bed. No complaints here. It's worth the money for extra comfort.
customer_reviews.author: ERnurse4

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Better than it needed to be, worse than I'd hoped it would be. It's still more comfortable than it was, but it is pretty susceptible to peeling away from the edges when someone is on it. Even really pinning it down with fitted sheets doesn't stop this entirely. I was hoping it would be heavier and more like a memory foam feel. Instead it feels pretty light and less like real memory foam.
customer_reviews.author: WH3

customer_reviews.title: Fractured vertebrae relief!
customer_reviews.text: Staying in temporary housing with a very old, worn mattress caused severe back pain so purchased this to see if it would provide pain relief. It helped soooo much and like others, I don't want to get out of bed it feels so good. I had no issues with odor, opened it up, sprayed one side with Lysol spray, after it dried, sprayed the other and put it right on the bed. My other topper is in storage and I hesitated to buy another, but really needed pain relief and this did not disappoint. I love this topper.
customer_reviews.author: BAILEIGH

customer_reviews.title: Not the memory foam mattress as described
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is just as hard as the bed I was trying to cover up. What a waste of money. This is 3 inches of hard foam and 1 inch of memory foam. I am a side sleeper and I bought this so my shoulders wouldn't be compressed but there is no give to this product. Tossed and turned all night. I would only purchase if you're looking for super firm
customer_reviews.author: Sherri

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Saving my back!!! This is absolutely great, came out of the box flat, plumped up to full four inches thick on my king size bed. It is comfortable and firm, even though I purchased the softer version. I sleep so much better and my husband snores less. I highly recommend this for anyone considering a full Tempurpedic mattress, to try out before buying. I won't be buying the mattress now, until this great thing wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Joe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for that extra cushion you'll need for an RV bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our RV bed which is not the most comfortable mattress to start with. So we were hoping that this 4 inch memory foam mattress topper would help and I was surprised on how much it helped us. It is perfect fit for our real queen size bed in our RV. We get a better nights sleep now with this memory foam topper.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnybobandtinkerbell

customer_reviews.title: Transformative
customer_reviews.text: This topper transformed our inexpensive mattress into a luxurious comfort! Aches and pains have been banished and the Resiliency is astonishing! We are two large ppl 6’3 frames 230+ pounds. The topper springs back and it isn’t hot. We encased ours with a zippered full encased mattress protector and the mattress and topper look like one unit. Highly recommend for aches and pains and dull mattresses!
customer_reviews.author: Will Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great for beds and dog beds
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for our guest bedroom. Very comfortable and good temperature control -- you don't get too hot or too cold sleeping on this. Second time I purchased the memory foam mattress topper was for my dog. All his beds were flattening out, and I worried for his bones what with his lengthy sleeps. I looked at the price of new dog beds, yikes, and decided to DIY it. I bought one of these and cut it up so it fit into three of the dog's beds, and also the sides and headrests for his beds. Now I too can sit on his bed at visit with him. I highly recommend this topper.
customer_reviews.author: O

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this mattress top and really love the difference it makes in sleeping
customer_reviews.text: We have a pillow top mattress that is only about 4 years old but it wasn't giving us enough support. I ordered this mattress top and really love the difference it makes in sleeping. The only downfall is not all my sheets are deep enough to stay completely on the mattress and the topper because it does raise the height of the bed. I'm going to need to purchase some type of stool to be able to reach the mattress without straining myself. But regardless of that inconvenience, we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best night's sleep
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love this topper. So glad I only listened to the good reviews. As soon as I got it, I opened it and let it air out for a few days. I put that topper on and WOW what a great nights sleep. I had previously used a foam mattress topper. If you want a good quality product and a good nights sleep buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Mia Girlie

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality
customer_reviews.text: Thrilled with quality and cover over foam. I put this under mattress (no box spring) on top of bunkie board and now the bed is perfect with raising comfort and bed height. Would definately purchase again
customer_reviews.author: grandmagail

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok. But good for pregnancy joint pain
customer_reviews.text: Makes the bed really tall. We are on day 4 and it still smells terrible. Bought it because I'm 7 months pregnant with twins. Message boards said a 4 inch memory topper was good for joint pain. And it is! Haven't woken with hip pain since I started using it (in combination with a belly support wedge). However, its very soft. I sink in, which causes our little dog that sleeps with is to roll into me. Don't love that. So, its just ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Dillman

customer_reviews.title: NOT memory foam
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT memory foam. It's just a soft pillowy 4" topper. It slides off the bed as well. You'd have to finagle something to keep it in place. To pay $80 of my hard-earned money for something that isn't memory foam really ticks me off!!! It was vacuum sealed and I'd never get it back in the packaging or I'd return it. Boo, hiss.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: I love this mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress topper! I bought the queen size. It was not difficult to unpack, it comes tightly rolled in a plastic drawstring bag. I took it out of the bag and placed it on the bed, took the vacuum packing off and it began to inflate immediately and was full size within two hours. There was a very minor odor that I did not smell after making up the bed. It has give but is also supportive. I slept well for the first time in months. No tossing and turning because of hip pain. It is well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It expands to 4 inches thick
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit concerned when I first unpacked this. The foam section was closer to 2 inches thick and the blue gel section was completely flattened. But the whole thing expanded to the expected 4 inches over a few hours. The padding adds extra cushioning to my too-firm mattress.
customer_reviews.author: HRaymond

customer_reviews.title: Too soft
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper made my back pain 10x worse. It offers no support at all and is far too soft. You’ll sink right into it, making it hard to move around or get out of bed. Night after night I tried to get used to it, and In the morning I’d wake up aching all over. Also, for some reason the full size is wider than my full size mattress, so it hangs over on both sides. Just a bad purchase for me all around.
customer_reviews.author: Loveology

customer_reviews.title: Want soft? Buy something else
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is extremely firm with very little give to it. I couldn't even make it a whole night with it on my bed as it just had absolutely no give to it. My hope was for a mattress topper with a fair amount of yield to really cradle my body but this was not it. Felt like sleeping on the ground, to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Will make you comfy and toasty!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to sleep on my back and sides. However, this topper runs very warm! I’m always cold, so for me to wake up drenched in sweat (gross), it is very telling. For reference, I’m 5’3”, 135 lbs. Love the topper otherwise. Easy to unpack and the smell dissipated quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, feels comfortable, the first night i slept on it i woke up with back pain, but after that i been enjoying it greatly, as i love to get up at night and now my fiance doesn't get woke up any more. I just wish there was less movement of the foam, would've been nice if there was flaps at the ends of the foam mattress so i could tie it down and untie it easily, but i resorted to sewing a couple of sides down which worked good enough. I enjoy this product very much.
customer_reviews.author: Ronzander

customer_reviews.title: I hated that bed
customer_reviews.text: I had my tonsils removed as an adult and I bought this for the bed I had to recover in. Before I bought this, I hated that bed. It was really uncomfortable. After I bought this, that bed is almost as comfortable as my Tempurpedic cloud. I would highly recommend this for anyone. I didn't have to buy new sheets, it went on easy, and the factory memory foam smell (My Tempurpedic had it too) went away after a single day of being out of the package. It now has no smell at all. It's soft and comfortable and is completely supportive. I sleep really well on this.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Hot, Hot, Hot!
customer_reviews.text: Although this topper has significantly helped with my sciatic pain, which is non existent now, I’m continuing to wake up several times during the night because I’m so hot. This topper traps body heat making it very difficult for me to sleep through the night – even with two fans on and no one else in my bed. The topper was purchased in February. I can’t return it now, so I need to decide what’s worse: back pain or overheating. If only sleep wasn’t necessary...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Split the Difference
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in 2016 and it was amazing! Comfortable, not too hot, gave a 6 year old mattress some new life. 18 months later when it died (which is a fair amount of longevity for a topper) I replaced with the same one. 4 months later and its 1/3 its original side, bows in the middle and my wife and I have been extra creaky in the back department the last few weeks. So one was 5 stars and one was 2 stars, so I'l split the difference with 3 stars. Roll the bones, you might like it. Of course, you might hate it, too.
customer_reviews.author: B. Langle

customer_reviews.title: False advertising of foam mattress
customer_reviews.text: It is far from a foam mattress. I purchased this because my sister had one of these from four years back and the quality of the product from then to now is night and day difference. Not at all a foam memory mattress, it was stiff and hard as a board! I now have severe back pain from it and have had to schedule a doctors appointment to solve this problem. Never would recommend this to anyone! If you also look at all the 5 star reviews it’s from 2017! The current ones have the same issue i do! Returning it is a pain in the butt! Avoid purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Lims

customer_reviews.title: ... give it a try and my husband and I love it!
customer_reviews.text: A friend had bought this and told me about it so I thought I would give it a try and my husband and I love it!! Our mattress is old and we really need a new one but we thought lets give this a try till we can afford a new mattress and we were very happy with how we felt sleeping on it at night as it was like having a new mattress. When we woke up no more back pains or aches of any kind since buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Placko

customer_reviews.title: High-quality purchase 👌
customer_reviews.text: I had been scouring the internet and close-proximity big box stores for a good foam bed/mattress for my truck bed for camping. After reading some good reviews and comparing the price/quality ratio, I decided on this one in a Full size. Let me tell you; this was the perfect purchase for my needs. Not only does the pad fit perfectly in my 6ft. truck bed (with a little smooshing down), but I was able to comfortable side-sleep with just this pad on plywood! 👌
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a travel trailer with a short queen mattress. We needed to purchase a mattress topper because the supplied RV mattress was hard and very uncomfortable. This topper is awesome! It fits perfectly and provides enough support and comfort that we can now get a good nights sleep. We did unpack it and let it lay out flat for a day or two before we put it on. We did not experience any odor as some other reviews have said.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and i love this pad! We had bought a mattress that was on the cheaper side a couple of years ago. The pad really made the bed more comfortable! We have had it now for about 3 years and still going strong! We will probably repurchase another pad for our spare room bed.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa P.

customer_reviews.title: It’s A Dream! 😂👍
customer_reviews.text: Unbelievably great product ever! Used this for our 2015 Laredo Traveling Trailer and after the 1st night of using this foam topper....no complaints, no pain in my lower back and definitely slept ALL night! Also no funky smell like some of the other foam toppers either! Going to refer this foam toppers to all of our camping / non-camping friends! Such a great product and the price for this....that you won’t even regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Miceli

customer_reviews.title: Saved my Deployment!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad was heaven sent! I was about to spend six months on a mattress that rivaled the concrete floor, ordered this bad boy (which delivered surprisingly fast, given it was going to an APO) it seriously made my deployment. Nothing is more important than a goodnight's sleep and I enjoyed every night. Left it for my replacement, reluctantly, and she enjoyed it as well. The removable,washable, cover made it not so weird to receive gifts from a stranger :)
customer_reviews.author: AcTurnwald

customer_reviews.title: .(camping sleeping pad) not 4 inch not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: 4 inch hmmm...more like 2 inch. And it's not memory foam because it has this cover and it's not what I am looking for. Now I have 3 2 inch and all of them r uncomfortable uuggg
customer_reviews.author: Maxxamill

customer_reviews.title: Funky
customer_reviews.text: After having this for almost a week the funk still lingers! Smells like old tobacco or i shudder to think... mold. I even put a zippered mattress encasement but the funk persists, especially when we turn or sit on it, and it came wrapped in like three layers of plastic. It's thick and makes my bed quite high but if it were easy to return I'd probably send it back.
customer_reviews.author: tch

customer_reviews.title: Best fix to an old mattress
customer_reviews.text: It is just what I needed to help my shoulder and hip pain. I am 170lbs and am a side sleeper. I have no more pain and I can even sleep on my back and my butt sinks enough that my back is supported. love it, glad I got the 4 inch. At first I thought I may have made a mistake but after the 1st night to even now i am so glad I did get the 4 inch. I put it on a memory foam 14 in mattress that had lost its ability to sink in to support my curves. Awesome fix instead of getting a new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Deff buy this one!!! I got the king and it expanded right away. Not to heavy to handle. Very very comfortable. Its like you bought a new bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very, very comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: This topper has made my life so much better. I highly recommend it to anyone seeking a better night sleep. My mattress was not good enough, I was hurting all over but not anymore!! Do yourself a favor and buy this. You deserve it. You are worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda831

customer_reviews.title: Not 3 inches thick, try one three quarters at most.
customer_reviews.text: I talked to Amazon, and was very pleased with how they handled it. I've been a member of Amazon for quite a long time and have always been satisfied with them. So it's good to know they're still the place I believe them to be. As for the mattress topper? It's still not any thicker than 1.75 inches, but that's not Amazon's fault.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Not actually 4"
customer_reviews.text: The one I received was actually 3", and it's had over a month to expand... which is pretty disappointing for me. It's not as soft as I thought it would be, which is sort of uncomfortable at times depending on how I'm laying, but it has drastically improved my sleep quality when I do find the right "spot" -- so I'm not gonna complain much! I plan on adding a pillow top cover to it for some plush-ness. It's very supportive if that's what you're looking for, though!
customer_reviews.author: Andee

customer_reviews.title: Only "fluffed" to 3"...
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews of this thing not getting to the 4" mark, but hoped I was going to be one of the lucky ones that would get one at it's full height. Mine has been sitting out for 3 days now and it still has only reached 3". I was hoping to use this on it's own in the back of my truck for camping, but after a test run, it's not comfy enough so it's going back.
customer_reviews.author: K. Kohen

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t Expand Like Should
customer_reviews.text: So I have mixed reviews because I have a King that I absolutely love but we also bought a full and that one never “fluffed” up enough so the top 1.5 inches is more like a half inch. Not really good quality is that essence. Not super happy with that but the King is nice and appears to do what I would like it to.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: 4 Inch Mattress Topper (Fantastic)
customer_reviews.text: This topper is wonderful for me. I have osteoarthritis in both hip joints. I am on my 2nd mattress in 3 years. The last mattress I purchased is a memory foam. At first it was comfortable, but as I age, my arthritic condition changes. Difficult to get comfortable in bed. I did not look forward to going to bed at night until I received this topper. I have had it on top of my mattress about 5 days now and it has brought great comfort. Also my sheets fit better because the topper added depth to my 6 inch mattress.
customer_reviews.author: CMD

customer_reviews.title: So great we bought multiples!
customer_reviews.text: These toppers have been outstanding; so comfortable that we have it on our bed and our guest beds. So far everyone has slept vey well. Never an issue with a smell after opening. Found it did slip a bit but purchased a mattress pad that covers both the mattress and topper; no more slippage. 11/01/2019 - Just purchased another one for a 4th bed.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spharler

customer_reviews.title: not all memory foam
customer_reviews.text: I was under the impression that this was 4 inches of memory foam which i need and not 2 inches of memory over cheap hard foam. All the pics shown show a solid piece but one that i missed. Now i cant repack and return this thing. I got a disabled ffamily member sleeping on another hard surface. The good old days when you could get an entire piece of good memory foam are over and I have slept on memory foam since 1995.
customer_reviews.author: Ivette S.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not correct size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a queen size and it is way bigger. It is a good 6-8 inches wider and about 4 inches longer than my queen size mattress. It will be such a pain to box back up and send back. I am going to try and trim it to fit the bed. I do like the comfort of it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Mac

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable.  Prevented me from having to purchase a new bed.
customer_reviews.text: Because of aging back, hip, and joint problems, I thought I was going to replace my firm mattress. A friend suggested this topper, and it has made the difference between having a comfortable bed, or having to purchase a new bed. Good comfort at a decent price.
customer_reviews.author: R in Bama

customer_reviews.title: Reduced my back pain.  My back pain is virtually gone.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this mattress. I don't care who makes it, it works extremely well. Horrible back problems for over 10 years. Tried every bed out there. Actually laid this over my very expensive Serta and now it has almost eliminated my back pain. So excited. Also it stay very cool. I have tried many foam toppers, but this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sky Ninja

customer_reviews.title: Baby got back
customer_reviews.text: My back is indebted to this topper and the wife's hip is thoroughly pleased as well. If your a side sleeper like me and tend to hug the edge of the bed, it can move a bit at night but you won't notice until the next morning and you can easily slide it back in position.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: IT FIXED MY PROBLEM
customer_reviews.text: I have a sore on one hip. I could only sleep in one position without pain and sometimes no position was painless. Have three different beds all with various degrees of firmness I got the memory foam mattress in July. From the first night, I could sleep in any position without pain. I can put it on any of my other mattresses and lay down in any position without pain. I am a light sleeper and toss and turn a lot but whatever position I get in is comfortable. I am going to get another to cover an older mattress. With the pad it feels new again!
customer_reviews.author: Dale McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This took no time to accommodate as soon as we unpacked it it formed right into it's shape. It feels very comfortable will buy more for the other beds
customer_reviews.author: julie lainez

customer_reviews.title: GREAT topper - no chemical smell!
customer_reviews.text: Made all the difference in my elderly father's sleeping comfort. Got this to go on an electric bed. Fit perfectly and transformed the bed to his comfort. Did NOT smell of chemicals at all as many toppers do. We took it outside to air it out before using and found we didn't need to as there as no offensive chemical odor. Would happily buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: ATxQT

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not memory foam more like hard foam
customer_reviews.text: If this is memory foam then its the worst one I've slept on. Its a pretty hard foam mattress thing. I bought another brand for my queen bed and that one was Excellent this one is bad. You get in it an it so hard it sticks up in the air beside you.. its bad.. def spend a little more money and get a better one
customer_reviews.author: Rose and Fam

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, easy to get on to the bed even with one person, pretty light weight. It does slip around on my bed a little I don't know if that's just the way I sleep or my bed but I usually have to push it back into place in the morning. However I have been sleep 10x better since I got it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gilstrap

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This topper turned my mother in law's uncomfortable old sofa bed into a bed i didn't want to get out of. Very soft and comfortable. Did not smell and on the bottom there's a slip guard so it doesn't move around during the night. I slept like a baby and my back didn't hurt the next day! Thinking of getting one for our bed at home. We have a good mattress, but I would love the extra softness. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Raised my bed up almost 5 inches
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded expectations! Fluffed up completely to almost 5 inches within 90 mins. Absolutely no odors! I slept better than I have in ages! Seemed to hold heat though, will need top remove a blanket to make it cooler. I'll update my review in a few months, but so far, I'm thrilled with my topper.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Cassity

customer_reviews.title: Yikes!!
customer_reviews.text: The good news: It has a nice zippered cover and looks great. The bad news: It feels like you’re sleeping on a board! Not cushy or soft at all. We wanted a soft topper for our older mattress and this disappointed beyond words. It also caves on the side and there’s now a big dent where we lay. Our bed is tall and we almost slip off the side of the bed now where the big intention is. Will be returning. Not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Joslin

customer_reviews.title: 4" Topper Makes an Immeasurable Difference!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this topper for our new RV. The mattress that came with the camper was rock hard but this 4" topper is ABSOLUTELY PERFECT! It made our mattress completely sleepable! It comes packed into a reuseable bag that will be perfect for laundry, with minimal smell and it dissipated quickly (within a day). It fully expanded within 24 hours as well, quite cozy! I cannot imagine having to return this mattress, having to fit it back into that bag & box!
customer_reviews.author: Cyn R.

customer_reviews.title: Not good for us
customer_reviews.text: Not good for us. It didn't have any memory feel to the mattress. For those who have owned memory foam you know what I mean. This was nothing like it .
customer_reviews.author: Aoogha

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: I like that this has helped with my aches and pains however, because it is so thick it doesn't fit under the mattress pad and when you move it slides off the bed and needs to be fixed numerous times a night. It even pulls the mattress pad off.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable! Very thick and feels like great quality
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable! Very thick and feels like great quality. My husband has bulging discs in his back. His doctor suggested a memory foam mattress. That was not in the budget so we went with this for now. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: havmt slept on it as of this review but after unpacking it and letting it settle to the 4 inch it was so comfortable I wanted to sleep in my driveway with it (its in my camper) but my wife wouldn't let me hahahaha but as comfy as it was im positive its gonna be a huge improvement to the uncomfortable springs going into my shoulder trying to sleep up at camp
customer_reviews.author: andrew shoaff

customer_reviews.title: it smells really bad
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it on my bed yet because I have been airing it out for the past week. I also washed the cover because it also smelled. Laying it out - it did reach the 3 inches in depth. I have yet to put it on my bed but will update when I do.
customer_reviews.author: margie

customer_reviews.title: If you like firm toppers with an inkling of softness
customer_reviews.text: This is not as soft as I’d expect a 4 inch topper to be. I owned a 4inch topper before and it was extremely soft but firm enough to keep you aligned. This is soft but more on the firm side. If you like firm toppers with an inkling of softness, this is for you! I’m still using it because it’s much better than the cheap mattress I currently have lol
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great rest for my pets.
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this foam to make dog beds. It works perfectly. Cut into small section to replace old padding in dog beds.
customer_reviews.author: Trip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for average weight people okay for plus-size people
customer_reviews.text: I think this product will be excellent for someone who is average weight but for someone who is plus size like me it's just okay but with that being said I don't sink all the to the bottom it does feel like I'm sleeping on memory foam and it does give my back inside a little extra support so I would recommended for people in the 350lbs and up Club
customer_reviews.author: Emma Sheehan
